originalText.text: Big thanks to Time Shred Services for always doing a fantastic job. Their customer service team is amazing and are able to assist with any requests or questions. Billing and scheduling service is simple to manage.

text.text: Big thanks to Time Shred Services for always doing a fantastic job. Their customer service team is amazing and are able to assist with any requests or questions. Billing and scheduling service is simple to manage.

originalText.text: I haven't used your services yet, but I had to write to let you know that DIANA who answered the telephone has FANTASTIC customer service vibes!!!  She answered all of my questions and has a great attitude.  I  will be scheduling with you in the next day or so.

text.text: I haven't used your services yet, but I had to write to let you know that DIANA who answered the telephone has FANTASTIC customer service vibes!!!  She answered all of my questions and has a great attitude.  I  will be scheduling with you in the next day or so.

originalText.text: The shred person was on time and being a very petite and older person I reuested assistance dragging 7 years of documents down my 3 flights of steps. He looked horrified but eventually helped but was reluctant. The shredding went okay and I paid and gave him a nice tip. Later I noticed a pair of earrings I left on a table that we had to pass was missing never yo be found! I won't be using time shred again since it was a very unpleasant experience. Please doscontinue your emails.

originalText.text:
I haven't even used this company yet. I was looking for a company that picks up shredding for residential I was browsing the internet and this company was the first to come up, it was meant to be. I was stressing because I have a lot of papers that are not open. I had a quite a bit of questions to ask, and the young lady that answered the phone Adele was so lovely to deal with she had empathy, she answered all my questions and her answers were genuine not some bull like other places I've call. Adele gave great Customer Service and that is important to a company. I will definitely be using this company as soon as I get the rest of the paper in order.

I finally used them, and baby let me tell you, I had the best experience ever. Customer service was excellent when booking the appointment, the answered all my questions and made me feel at eased, the were professional and treated me like I was a queen, no lie. The drivers that did the shredding was just so fantastic, they shred your documents right in front of you, that made me feel real secure. The price was so inexpensive and they were finished in less than 20min, blew my mind. I highly recommend Time Shred. üòâ‚ò∫Ô∏è

originalText.text: Very disrespectful company to park in a handicapped parking spot. Obviously lack of supervision, compassion, direction and rules.  Will use another provider.
